description:

Christian sucks him until Richard cums all over himself. Christian is the champ of cumming almost at the same time as his friends, and this time is no different. He unloads his balls all over his abs, bringing an end to this hot blowjob scene.

title: Christian Wilde & Richard Cynderblock
